meta_title: Maintenance Backlog Definition: Metrics & Strategic Value
meta_description: A maintenance backlog is the total volume of pending work orders. Learn how to calculate backlog weeks to improve asset reliability and resource planning.
title: What Is Maintenance Backlog?

They are looking at a digital tablet that displays a clean, high-tech dashboard with charts.
